review: More than Chromecast. Better.  I just thought it would be similar.  Have to have the service (IE Netflix, etc) to see.  Other things, Music(I Heart Radio), Games.  All on screen with remote.  No need for a tablet, or laptop to start process, then go to the TV.
author: Gardensaurus

review: I love it so much. My uncle recommended it not knowing I already pruchased one.
author: Aviana

review: Our not so "smart" Toshiba tv was never able to connect to Amazon Prime and frankly never seemed all that "smart".  I tried other wireless devices prior to the Fire Stick and all failed miserably.  This device took maybe all of 5 minutes to set up, 4 of which were moving the tv and stand so I could access the electrical outlet.I've moved it several times to other tvs in the house with the same great setup and performance.This is a GREAT GREAT GREAT product - I am going to buy another one for use at our beach condo.
author: Raleigh Cat Lover "Raleigh Cat Lover"

review: This is great! Intuitive to navigate and it's just as easy to go to Netflix as it is to access Amazon Prime. It was a gift to my son and he lives here right now, but when he moves out in a few months, I'm going to miss the Firestick. May have to buy one for myself too.
author: MLeMieux

review: Have had it for about 2 months. It works great and really makes my Prime subscription more useful.

review: Tried it over the weekend.  Did not get to use all the features yet though.  Didn't realize that some of the movies you still have to pay for, was under the impression that all was free if you were using the fire stick.
